CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Spire Global Inc is a provider of space-based data, analytics, and space services, offering access to datasets and powerful insights about Earth from the ultimate vantage point so that organizations can make decisions with confidence, accuracy, and speed. The company uses multi-purpose satellite constellations to source hard to acquire, valuable data and enriches it with predictive solutions.
